Package database

package database
The package is supposed to perform functions of calculation, storing and showing data concerning user's investment portfolio and corresponding country diversification. Here is schema of present dependencies:
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
lennardjones
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CountryDiversification
    Class that is supposed to calculate and show country diversification in descending order.
    CountryShares
    This class is trying to connect to remote database to obtain information about shares of countries in the specific asset from the table that contains "Ticker" as first column and different countries as the other columns.
    DatabaseConnection
    Singleton class for connection to the remote database purposes.
    InvestmentPortfolio
    Class that is supposed to calculate and show user's investment portfolio
    StockPrices
    Class that obtains and stores stock prices of FinEx and VTB funds, also includes StockPrices.get(Ticker) method to retrieve the price by ticker.
    StockQuantity
    Class that stores information about user's each stock quantity.
